org.angiedev.schoolfinder.dao

Interface DistrictDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateDistrictDAO

    public interface DistrictDAO
    DistrictDAO is an interface which defines the data access operations to find, create and update districts.
    Author:
    Angela Gordon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteDistrict(District district)
      Deletes the passed in district from the database.
      District getDistrict(long districtId)
      Retrieves a district based on the passed in id.
      District getDistrictByLeaId(java.lang.String leaId)
      Retrieves a district based on the passed in lea id.
      java.util.List<District> getDistricts()
      Retrieves the list of districts in the database.
      void insertDistrict(District district)
      Inserts a new district into the database.
      void updateDistrict(District district)
      Updates a district with the passed in district's object data.

    • Method Detail

      • insertDistrict

        void insertDistrict(District district)
        Inserts a new district into the database.
        Parameters:
        district - the district being added to the database.

      • getDistrict

        District getDistrict(long districtId)
        Retrieves a district based on the passed in id.
        Parameters:
        districtId - the id uniquely identifying the district in the database (PK).
        Returns:
        the district if found, otherwise null.

      • getDistrictByLeaId

        District getDistrictByLeaId(java.lang.String leaId)
        Retrieves a district based on the passed in lea id.
        Parameters:
        leaId - the Local Education Agency Id for the district assigned by the National Center for Education Statistics.
        Returns:
        the district if found, otherwise null.

      • updateDistrict

        void updateDistrict(District district)
        Updates a district with the passed in district's object data.
        Parameters:
        district - district object containing new data that needs to be updated in database.

      • deleteDistrict

        void deleteDistrict(District district)
        Deletes the passed in district from the database.
        Parameters:
        district - district being deleted.

      • getDistricts

        java.util.List<District> getDistricts()
        Retrieves the list of districts in the database.
        Returns:
        the list of districts in database.
